tool_description: 最寄駅を所要時間や距離とともに出力します。路線や交通機関会社の検索APIも利用可能です。
name: NAVITIME Transport
title: NAVITIME Transport

api_list.name: transport_link/autocomplete
api_list.description: 指定したワードに対する路線名の自動補完候補を取得します。

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description:
Radius of search distances.
(Maximum value: 100,000, Default value: 10,000)
The unit is \\\"meters\\\".

Available only when 'coord' is specified.

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: word_match
optional_parameters.description:
Search method.
(prefix, partial)

optional_parameters.name: coord
optional_parameters.description: Latitude and longitude of the reference point to be searched.

api_list.name: transport_node/autocomplete
api_list.description: 指定したワードに対する駅名の自動補完候補を取得します。

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description:
Radius of search distances.
(Maximum value: 100,000, Default value: 10,000)
The unit is \\\"meters\\\".

Available only when 'coord' is specified.

optional_parameters.name: link
optional_parameters.description:
Route ID.
Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: word_match
optional_parameters.description:
Search method.
(prefix, partial)

optional_parameters.name: coord
optional_parameters.description: Latitude and longitude of the reference point to be searched.

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

api_list.name: transport_node/gateway
api_list.description: 駅IDなどを指定して駅出口の情報を取得します。

required_parameters.name: direction
required_parameters.description: Up and down classification of lines.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of response data. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 100, Default value: 10)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Skips a given number of first data.
(Minimum value: 0, Maximum value: 1000, Default value: 0)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

api_list.name: transport_company_address
api_list.description:
交通機関会社エリア検索
住所コードに合致する交通機関会社の一覧を取得します。

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Address Code. Only the prefecture level (2 digits) can be specified.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Skips a given number of first data. (Minimum value: 0, Maximum value: 1000, Default value: 0)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of response data. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 100, Default value: 10)

api_list.name: transport_link_id
api_list.description: Return lists of train line's information from the train line ID of request parameters.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Route ID. Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description: Additional output information. (node: list of stations that belong to a line)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sorting order of additional information . (up: inbound line, down: outbound line)

api_list.name: transport_company_id
api_list.description: Return public transport company's information from the public transport company ID of request parameters.

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description: Additional output information. (link: list of stations that belong to a company(default))

api_list.name: transport_node
api_list.description: Return lists of stations corresponding to the keyword or an address specified by request parameters.

required_parameters.name: word
required_parameters.description: Search word.  When multiple conditions are specified, the search is performed in the order of AND condition and OR condition. Truncate after 51 characters.

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description: Additional output information. (detail: detailed information on stations)

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description: Address Code. Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Skips a given number of first data. (Minimum value: 0, Maximum value: 1000, Default value: 0)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of response data. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 100, Default value: 10)

api_list.name: transport_link
api_list.description: Return lists of train lines from the keywords of request parameters.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sorting order of additional information . (up: inbound line, down: outbound line)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Skips a given number of first data. (Minimum value: 0, Maximum value: 1000, Default value: 0)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of response data. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 100, Default value: 10)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description: Additional output information. (node: list of stations that belong to a line)

api_list.name: transport_node_around
api_list.description: Return lists of stations (including entrance informations) from the specified latitude and longitude of request parameters based on walking distance.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of response data. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 30, Default value: 10)

optional_parameters.name: term
optional_parameters.description: Range of search times. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 1440, Default value: 60) The unit is "minutes".  Searches for the nearest station that can be reached within a specified number of minutes.  If there are few stations or bus stops in the vicinity, it may take a long time to search or an error may occur. In this case, it may be improved by reducing the time of the term.

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: walk_speed
optional_parameters.description: Walking speed. (Minimum value: 3, Maximum value: 8, Default value: 5) Unit is "km/h".  Small numbers are valid up to the first place.

api_list.name: transport_link_address
api_list.description: Return lists of train line from the address code of request parameters.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Address Code. Only the prefecture level (2 digits) can be specified.

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description: Additional output information. (node: list of stations that belong to a line)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Skips a given number of first data. (Minimum value: 0, Maximum value: 1000, Default value: 0)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sorting order of additional information . (up: inbound line, down: outbound line)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of response data. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 100, Default value: 10)

api_list.name: transport_link_company
api_list.description: Return lists of train lines from the public transport company ID of request parameters.

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description: Additional output information. (node: list of stations that belong to a line)

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sorting order of additional information . (up: inbound line, down: outbound line)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Skips a given number of first data. (Minimum value: 0, Maximum value: 1000, Default value: 0)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of response data. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 100, Default value: 10)

api_list.name: transport_node_id
api_list.description: Return station's information from the station ID of request parameters.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Node ID.  Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)
